source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_SEQ_00<tab>Alberic is keen to hear of your adventures.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_SEQ_00<tab>アドネール占星台のアルベリクは、冒険者の来訪を喜んでいるようだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_SEQ_01<tab>You find Alberic trying to keep warm at the Observatorium, and he welcomes the chance to exchange stories with his former student. Upon mention of Orn Khai, the young dragon himself appears, joining the conversation and listening eagerly as you regale him with your adventures in the First. Your account of Andreia's demise brings to mind the tale of Nidhogg, as he too was driven only by memories of a time long since passed. Orn Khai expresses his profound sorrow that no one would mourn the passing of the mighty wyrm, and suggests consulting Faunehm to learn more of the fallen Nidhogg.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_SEQ_01前回までの冒険録：
冒険者は、子竜オーン・カイと、彼の親竜ヴェズルフェルニルのかつての番いを探すことになる。見つけ出した番いの竜ファウネムは、理性を失い暴走してしまっていたが、冒険者は「竜狩りの達人」として雇われたエスティニアンと協力し、ファウネムを正気に戻すことに成功。ヴェズルフェルニルとファウネムは、千年のときを超えて番いに戻ることができたのだった。
　　　　　　　　　　　　*　*　*
オーン・カイとともにニーズヘッグの弔いをすることになった。眷属だったファウネムを訪ねて、ドラヴァニア雲海の白亜の宮殿で「オーン・カイ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_SEQ_02<tab>Faunehm answers Orn Khai's call and gladly shares her memories of her sire, Nidhogg. You learn that King Thordan had invited Ratatoskr to speak on behalf of all dragons. When he asked her to recount Nidhogg's views on mankind, she stated her beloved's thoughts on the matter, in particular that their mortal frailty made them unfit for the role of Hydaelyn's guardian. Upon hearing these words, Thordan was filled with rage and slaughtered Ratatoskr, which drove Nidhogg into madness and sparked the Dragonsong War. After concluding her account of these historic events, Faunehm advises that you commemorate him by offering a flower for which he had a particular affinity, the mist lily, at the site of his passing. Orn Khai believes that they can be found growing in Ohl Tahn and wastes not a moment in flying off to gather the elusive bloom.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_SEQ_02<tab>ファウネムから、ニーズヘッグの思い出話と、ヒトの王との悲しいすれ違いの話を聞いた。弔いのため、ドラヴァニア雲海のオール・ターンで、ニーズヘッグが愛した「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8E6D01 /var>」を探そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_SEQ_03<tab>The flowers you seek grow in the most unlikely of places, peeking out between the cracks of a stark rocky outcrop. Orn Khai will be pleased to hear that the search is over.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_SEQ_03<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8E6D01 /var>を見つけた。オール・ターンの「オーン・カイ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_SEQ_04<tab>Orn Khai is delighted that you were able to find the mist lilies and is eager to offer them in memorial of Nidhogg. Since his eyes were used to summon Shinryu, which you defeated in Gyr Abania, this could be considered his final resting place.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_SEQ_04<tab>オーン・カイと花を手向ける場所を相談した。ギラバニア湖畔地帯のアラミガン・クォーターで「オーン・カイ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_SEQ_05<tab>You and Orn Khai arrive at the Royal Menagerie to pay your respects to Nidhogg. As you reflect on past encounters with the wyrm, your mind is cast back to the days spent as an Azure Dragoon, fighting alongside Estinien. Satisfied that the memory of the wyrm's memory has been honored, Orn Khai asks that you share Faunehm's tale with Alberic.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_SEQ_05<tab>オーン・カイと空中庭園に向かい、ニーズヘッグに思いを馳せた。アドネール占星台に戻り、今回の旅路を「アルベリク」に話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_SEQ_06<tab>Back at the Observatorium, Alberic is intrigued to hear such a detailed account of King Thordan's betrayal. He plans to impart this newly revealed information to the Temple Knights, as he is a firm believer that matters of historical accuracy are of the utmost importance in building peaceful relations between man and dragon. Though the road ahead will not be an easy one, your friendship with Orn Khai will serve as a shining example that trust and cooperation are possible between your races, and that even former enemies need not be beholden to the past.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_SEQ_06<tab>アルベリクは、ファウネムが語った過去を神殿騎士団に伝え後世に残していくつもりだという。新時代の竜騎士の在り方を考えながら、アルベリクは冒険者のおかげで前へ進めるようになったと語った。冒険者も、竜とともに生きる未来の道筋を護るため、新時代の竜騎士としてこれからを歩んでいこう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Orn Khai in Zenith.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_TODO_00<tab>白亜の宮殿でオーン・カイと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_TODO_01<tab>Search for mist lilies.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_TODO_01<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8E6D01 /var>を探す

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Orn Khai.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Orn Khai in Gyr Abania.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_TODO_03<tab>アラミガン・クォーターでオーン・カイと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Alberic at the Observatorium.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_TODO_04<tab>アドネール占星台のアルベリクと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ALBERIC_000_000<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. It has been too long since last we spoke.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ALBERIC_000_000おや、)) (( )) 02 /var>じゃないか！
顔を見せに来てくれたのか？

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ALBERIC_000_001<tab>Your visits are far more frequent than those of another former student of mine, however. It would seem he still prefers to keep his own company.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ALBERIC_000_001嬉しく思うぞ。
黙って姿を消したきり、ろくに便りも送ってこない、
どこかの弟子に比べたら、なんと義理深いことか！

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ALBERIC_000_002<tab>The same could be said of Heustienne, who has made quite the name for herself as a hunter in Dravania, according to Orn Khai.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ALBERIC_000_002そうそう、近況と言えばウスティエヌのことだが……
ドラヴァニアの地で、槍の腕を活かして猟師をしているらしいぞ。
時折、オーン・カイが様子を知らせに来てくれているのだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ALBERIC_000_003<tab>Ah, what fortunate timing! Speak of the dragon and he shall appear.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ALBERIC_000_003<tab>むっ、噂をすれば…………

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ORNKHAI_000_004<tab>Greetings! Would I be correct in guessing you have returned fresh from one of your adventures?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ORNKHAI_000_004あっ、)) (( )) 02 /var>じゃないか！
今までどこに行ってたんだよ～！

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_Q1_000_200<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_Q1_000_200<tab>何と答える？

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_A1_000_200<tab>I traveled to a world beyond our own.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_A1_000_200<tab>ちょっと異世界で戦ってきた

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_A2_000_200<tab>I laid to rest the dreaded Andreia in a land known as Norvrandt.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_A2_000_200<tab>アンドレイアを狩りに行ってきた

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ORNKHAI_000_010<tab>To think that such a place could truly exist!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ORNKHAI_000_010うわ～、すごい冒険だね！
僕と旅した東方も、すごい遠くだと思ってたのに、
まさか、異なる世界に行っちゃうなんて！

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ALBERIC_000_011<tab>And that you have fought such terrifying foes. To fall so far from grace... 'Tis a tragic tale, if ever I heard one.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ALBERIC_000_011まさに想像を絶する冒険だな。
しかし、かつての英雄の亡骸が「罪喰い」なる異形となり、
生前の想いの残滓に縛られて彷徨っていたとは……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ORNKHAI_000_012<tab>One similar to that of Nidhogg.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ORNKHAI_000_012<tab>それって、まるでニーズヘッグみたいだね……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ALBERIC_000_013<tab>Aye, though nothing will ever compare to his malice. Even death could not quell his thirst for vengeance.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ALBERIC_000_013ああ、私も同じ感想を抱いたよ。
死してなお、竜の眼に残った魔力がエスティニアンの肉体を奪い、
怨念の化身となり、復讐を果たそうとしたのだから……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ALBERIC_000_014<tab>At least Andreia was not nearly so consumed by hate. I doubt not that Renda-Rae's soul is at peace.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ALBERIC_000_014だが、罪喰い「アンドレイア」は、君によって倒され、
レンダ・レイなる狩人の魂は、また安らぎを見出せたはずだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ORNKHAI_000_015<tab>Peace... I wonder if Nidhogg ever found it...
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ORNKHAI_000_015ならさ……
ニーズヘッグの魂は、どうなんだろう？

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ALBERIC_000_016<tab>I fear his soul yet lingers, doomed to wander endlessly.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ALBERIC_000_016ふむ……
ニーズヘッグを邪竜と呼び、憎んできた皇都の民は、
その死を喜びこそすれ、悼みはしないだろうからな。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ORNKHAI_000_017<tab>That is too cruel a fate, even for him!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ORNKHAI_000_017<tab>そ、そんなの哀しいじゃないか！

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ALBERIC_000_018<tab>I share your sentiments. For as the Azure Dragoon, I once gazed into his heart, as he gazed into mine. Such rage... Such sorrow...
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ALBERIC_000_018ああ……哀しいな。
せめて「蒼の竜騎士」として、かの竜の力を用いてきた我々は、
かつての敵とはいえ、散った竜を悼むべきなのかもしれん。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ORNKHAI_000_019<tab>I will not accept this! That none should mark his passing is more than I can bear. What say you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ORNKHAI_000_019オイラ、決めたぞ！
ニーズヘッグの弔いをするんだ！
)) (( )) 02 /var>、いっしょにやろうよ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_Q1_000_300<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_Q1_000_300<tab>何と答える？

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_A1_000_300<tab>Perhaps we could honor who he once was, if not what he became.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_A1_000_300<tab>かつて戦った強敵のために祈ろう

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_A2_000_300<tab>I, too, was an Azure Dragoon. Alberic speaks true.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_A2_000_300<tab>元「蒼の竜騎士」として礼節を尽くそう

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ORNKHAI_000_025<tab>Then we are in agreement!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ORNKHAI_000_025<tab>そうこなくっちゃ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ORNKHAI_000_026<tab>Though I must admit that as part of Hraesvelgr's brood, I have little knowledge of Nidhogg.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ORNKHAI_000_026……でも、よく考えてみたら、
フレースヴェルグ様の眷属の僕は、
ニーズヘッグのこと、よく知らないんだよね。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ORNKHAI_000_027<tab>A deeper insight is needed if I am to properly pay my respects.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ORNKHAI_000_027<tab>好きな物のひとつも知らないで、弔いなんてできないよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ORNKHAI_000_028<tab>Hmm... Faunehm is of his brood. If anyone would know, it is her. Let us make haste for Zenith!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ORNKHAI_000_028そうだ、眷属だった「ファウネム」さんなら、
ニーズヘッグのことも、よく知っているはずだよ！
「白亜の宮殿」に呼んで、話を聞いてみよう！

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ALBERIC_000_040<tab>For better or worse, I am who I am because of Nidhogg. While others rejoiced at his death, I cannot deny that a part of myself died that day.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ALBERIC_000_040ニーズヘッグの弔いなど、考えたこともなかったが、
いい機会なのかもしれないな。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ORNKHAI_000_045<tab>Faunehm is come.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ORNKHAI_000_045事情を話したら、快く来てくれたよ。
「ファウネム」さんに話を聞いてみよう！

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_FAUNEHM_000_050<tab>Welcome, noble dragoon. Orn Khai has explained all.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_FAUNEHM_000_050久しいな、我が恩人たる竜騎士よ。
すでにオーン・カイから事情は聞いている。
我が父祖たるニーズヘッグについて聞きたいのだとか？

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_FAUNEHM_000_051<tab>Pray tell, what was Nidhogg to you?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_FAUNEHM_000_051では、答える前にひとつ聞かせてもらいたい。
貴方にとって、ニーズヘッグとはいかなる存在なのだろうか？

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_Q1_000_400<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_Q1_000_400<tab>ニーズヘッグとは……？

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_A1_000_400<tab>A relentless adversary.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_A1_000_400<tab>手強い敵だった

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_A2_000_400<tab>The wellspring of my strength.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_A2_000_400<tab>竜騎士としての力の源だ

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_FAUNEHM_000_055<tab>And much more. For through his power, you are forever joined.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_FAUNEHM_000_055そうであろうとも……。
だが、今こうして貴方が生き残れているのは、
紛れもなくニーズヘッグの「竜の力」を得たがゆえのこと。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_FAUNEHM_000_060<tab>And yet you were enemies, each sworn to slay the other.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_FAUNEHM_000_060確かに貴方のヒト離れした強さは、紛れもなくニーズヘッグのもの。
だが、貴方とかの竜は、決して仲間でも友でもなく、
互いを殺そうとする敵であった。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_FAUNEHM_000_065<tab>Two souls, entwined by fate.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_FAUNEHM_000_065<tab>なんと複雑で、強く結びついた関係であることか……！

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_FAUNEHM_000_066<tab>Though you have faced Nidhogg's wrath and sensed his pain, you cannot know him as we dragons once did.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_FAUNEHM_000_066そんな関係にある貴方が、死した魂を弔うために、
我が父祖ニーズヘッグについて知りたいというのなら、
確かに語って聞かせるべきであろう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ORNKHAI_000_067<tab>We would fain hear his tale.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ORNKHAI_000_067やったね！
ニーズヘッグって、どんな竜だったの？

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_FAUNEHM_000_068<tab>Nidhogg was without equal, even among our kind.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_FAUNEHM_000_068一言で語るのは難しいが……
どの竜よりも強くあろうとする孤高の竜であった。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_FAUNEHM_000_070<tab>Destined was he to guard this world from the catastrophe that befell the Dragonstar, in place of his sire.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_FAUNEHM_000_070決して多くを語ろうとはしなかったが、
故郷たる竜星を滅ぼした脅威に、備えていたようだ。
力を失った幻龍に代わり、戦える存在であろうとな。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_FAUNEHM_000_075<tab>Destined was he to guard this world from catastrophe, in place of his sire.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_FAUNEHM_000_075決して多くを語ろうとはしなかったが、
星の脅威に対しても、戦える存在であろうとしていたようだ。
力を失った幻龍の代わりを務めようとな。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_FAUNEHM_000_080<tab>He valued strength above all else, and considered the affairs of mortals beneath his notice.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_FAUNEHM_000_080そうした、強さへの並々ならぬ想いからか、
弱く儚い命たるヒトを、軽んじる傾向があったのだ。
フレースヴェルグの愛ゆえに、融和がなった時代でさえな。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_FAUNEHM_000_081<tab>Only the seven great wyrms were worthy of his attention. And among them, none but Ratatoskr truly understood him.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_FAUNEHM_000_081ニーズヘッグにとって、真に交友するに値するのは、
同じ七大天竜くらいのものであったのだろう。
ゆえに語らう相手といえば、もっぱら詩竜ラタトスクであった。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_FAUNEHM_000_082<tab>Her song was beautiful indeed, and she graced both dragon and man with her wisdom.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_FAUNEHM_000_082一方のラタトスクは、竜詩を紡ぎ語らうことを好む竜だった。
相手が竜であろうとヒトであろうと別け隔てなくな。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_FAUNEHM_000_083<tab>She was invited by Thordan, king of men, to speak on our behalf. Ratatoskr expressed our desire to live in harmony. However, it was known that Nidhogg did not share these views.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_FAUNEHM_000_083ある時、ラタトスクはヒトの王の下を訪れ、語って聞かせた。
だが、かの竜は竜詩を紡ぐことに長けても、
嘘のつき方を知らなかった。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_FAUNEHM_000_084<tab>When the king asked her how her brother saw mankind, she did not hide the truth. He believed that such frail creatures were incapable of protecting this star, that the task must be entrusted to the seven great wyrms alone.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_FAUNEHM_000_084ラタトスクはヒトに乞われるまま、ニーズヘッグの言葉を語った。
ヒトは脆弱で、取るに足らない存在であり、
母なる星の守護者たるに相応しきは、幻龍の子たる七大天竜だと。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ORNKHAI_000_085<tab>And that is why Thordan slew her!?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ORNKHAI_000_085じ、じゃあ……！
ヒトの王が裏切ったのは……！

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_FAUNEHM_000_086<tab>Ratatoskr had no intention of sowing discord, but the king could not countenance that his kind would be treated with such contempt, that we dragons would seek to claim this star as our own.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_FAUNEHM_000_086竜は、ヒトを蔑ろにして、星の支配者たらんとしている。
そう誤解したのであろうな、トールダンなる王は……。
ゆえに竜の力を欲し、裏切りに手を染めたのだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_FAUNEHM_000_087<tab>He turned on Ratatoskr, taking not only her eyes, but her life.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_FAUNEHM_000_087誰もが、決定的な悪意はなく、
誤解の連鎖によって恐ろしい出来事が起きたのだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_FAUNEHM_000_088<tab>When Nidhogg discovered that King Thordan had murdered his beloved, his fury was beyond reckoning.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_FAUNEHM_000_088己が言葉が種となり、裏切りが芽吹き、
誰よりも大切にしていたラタトスクを喪った。
それを知るゆえに、すべてを許せず永遠の復讐を望んだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_FAUNEHM_000_089<tab>For all his strength, he could not master his own rage. It utterly consumed him.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_FAUNEHM_000_089私が知る父祖ニーズヘッグは、
強さと弱さを兼ね備えた竜だった……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ORNKHAI_000_090<tab>Dragons, men─we are all the same. Slaves to our emotion, subservient to our hearts.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ORNKHAI_000_090なんて……なんて、哀しい出来事なんだ！
もう少し互いを理解していれば……！

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_FAUNEHM_000_091<tab>Yet there are those who would seek another path, as I once did. I turned my back on my father and his quest for vengeance.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_FAUNEHM_000_091私が、父祖の命に背いて戦いから逃げたのは、
その争いの無益さと悲惨さゆえでもあったのだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_FAUNEHM_000_092<tab>Valiant dragoon, by your strength was the Dragonsong War ended, and by your compassion was a new alliance forged.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_FAUNEHM_000_092だから、竜詩戦争を終わりに導いた竜騎士よ、
貴方は、オーン・カイら若き翼と交わり、互いを知ってほしい。
我らは、同じ星に生きる隣人なのだから……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ORNKHAI_000_093<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> and I are living proof that we can live side by side. We shall speak the message of peace to man and dragon alike. And when we are gone, our descendants will do the same!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ORNKHAI_000_093わかったよ、ファウネムさん。
僕は、)) (( )) 02 /var>といっしょに生きる！
寿命で死んじゃったら、その子供とも仲良くする！

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_FAUNEHM_000_094<tab>Tell them of Nidhogg. His strength, his weakness, his love, his hate. Tell them the truth.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_FAUNEHM_000_094それでいい。
そして、願わくば星の守護者たることを己に定めた、
孤独で偉大な竜がいたことを、子らに伝えてくれ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_FAUNEHM_000_095<tab>Orn Khai, you wish to commemorate Nidhogg's passing, yes? As my father once enjoyed the fragrance of mist lilies, perhaps they would make a suitable offering.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_FAUNEHM_000_095そうだ、もうひとつ……まだ弔いの気持ちがあるなら、
「」を手向けるといい。
我が父祖が、その香りを好んだ花だ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ORNKHAI_000_096<tab>What a splendid idea! Thank you, Faunehm!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ORNKHAI_000_096<tab>ありがとう、ファウネムさん！

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ORNKHAI_000_097<tab>I have often seen such flowers blooming in Ohl Tahn. Follow me!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ORNKHAI_000_097「」は、「オール・ターン」にあるはずだよ。
行こう、)) (( )) 02 /var>！

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_FAUNEHM_000_100<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_FAUNEHM_000_100<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ORNKHAI_000_105<tab>I distinctly recall seeing mist lilies in this very spot. What could have happened to them?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ORNKHAI_000_105「」は、この辺りにあるはずだけど……。
)) (( )) 02 /var>も、探してみてよ？

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ORNKHAI_000_120<tab>So there were mist lilies here after all? Then it would appear my memory served me correctly. A pity that the same cannot be said of my eyes...
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ORNKHAI_000_120「」を見つけたんだね？
くっそー、僕の方が早く見つけようと思ったのにな！

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ORNKHAI_000_121<tab>It is of no matter. There is one thing that concerns me, however. In your funerary rites, the offering of flowers and such occurs at a grave or place of significance, I believe. But where should we choose for Nidhogg?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ORNKHAI_000_121ま、とにかく目当ての品は見つかったんだ。
その花を手向けに……って、どこに行こうか？
ニーズヘッグの最期の場所って、心当たりあったりする？

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ORNKHAI_000_122<tab>Gyr Abania... Yes, that could be considered his final resting place, if that was where you fought the primal born of his eyes.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ORNKHAI_000_122ふむふむ、ニーズヘッグの「竜の眼」は神降ろしに使われて、
召喚した神龍ってのは、アラミゴで倒した……と。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ORNKHAI_000_123<tab>Although I must say, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, you seem rather adept at putting down dragons. And primals that resemble dragons. It makes me glad that we are not enemies!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ORNKHAI_000_123ほんとに、)) (( )) 02 /var>って、
何から何まで倒しちゃうんだね。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ORNKHAI_000_124<tab>Ahem. To matters at hand, then. I shall go on ahead and meet you in Gyr Abania.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ORNKHAI_000_124とにかく、花を手向ける場所は、最期の戦いの場所で決まりだね。
じゃあ、ギラバニア湖畔地帯の「アラミガン・クォーター」まで、
競争だよ……いっそげー！

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ORNKHAI_000_130<tab>What a relief to have found you at last! I had become rather lost, you see.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ORNKHAI_000_130<tab>へっへ～ん、競争は僕の勝ちだね！

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ORNKHAI_000_131<tab>Perhaps we had best hurry on to the Royal Menagerie before I lose my way again.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ORNKHAI_000_131それじゃ、さっそく空中庭園に行こう！
案内役は任せたからね～！

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ORNKHAI_000_200<tab>Nidhogg, we are come to honor your memory!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ORNKHAI_000_200ここが、偉大な七大天竜の一翼、
ニーズヘッグのエーテルが最期に消えた場所なんだね……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ORNKHAI_000_201<tab>Though now that we are here, I am at a loss for words... <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, is there anything you wish to say?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ORNKHAI_000_201僕は、いちども会ったことはなかったけど、
きっと強い竜だったんだろうなぁ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_Q1_000_000<tab>ニーズヘッグに何と語りかける？

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_A1_000_000<tab>You will be remembered.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_A1_000_000<tab>貴方のことは忘れない

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_A2_000_000<tab>Your legacy will live on in the songs of your people.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_A2_000_000<tab>貴方の想いを引き継ごう

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_SYSTEM_000_205<tab>From distant star, a Father bore seven eggs. Great wyrms rose forth, powerful and wise. On blackened wings, one soared on high with a roar that set the world atremble. Guarding their home in the Father's stead, he was fearsome yet just.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_SYSTEM_000_205かつて、この星には偉大な竜がいた。
はるか彼方より、始祖たる幻龍に伴われてやってきたその竜は、
この星で孵り、育ち、大いなる黒き翼となった……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_SYSTEM_000_206<tab>Man, wicked and vain, betrayed the wyrm and his kin, slaying his beloved and plucking out his eyes. Thenceforth, he lived only for vengeance, his wrath irrepressible.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_SYSTEM_000_206その竜は、幻龍に代わり星の守護者たらんとした。
しかし、裏切りと戦いの果てに、その「眼」はヒトの手に渡り、
千年の後、に竜の力を与えた。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_SYSTEM_000_207<tab>A thousand years hence, two champions of mankind were granted great strength by the stolen eyes. Destined were they to face the wyrm, who had risen once more to wage war on his sworn enemy. At the end of their struggle, the wayward son fell silent.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_SYSTEM_000_207やがて、竜とふたりの蒼の竜騎士は、戦場で相対した。
膨らみ続ける怨念、燻り続ける復讐心、友を救わんとする願い、
そのすべてが交差し、竜は消え去った……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_SYSTEM_000_210<tab>These guardians and their comrades continue to watch over the star, their heroic deeds recounted by minstrels and storytellers far and wide. Even the ancient foe from which the Father of Dragons once fled could not withstand their might.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_SYSTEM_000_210紅の竜騎士となったふたりは、今も星を護るため戦い続ける。
竜が払おうとした星の脅威、オメガを斃したように、
これからもずっと……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_SYSTEM_000_215<tab>These guardians continue to watch over the star, their heroic deeds recounted by minstrels and storytellers far and wide.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_SYSTEM_000_215紅の竜騎士となったふたりは、今も星を護るため戦い続ける。
これからもずっと……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ORNKHAI_000_220<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I am not blind to the sins Nidhogg committed. I mourn the loss of what he once was, what he may have become had he been dealt a kinder fate.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ORNKHAI_000_220)) (( )) 02 /var>……
今回は、とても小さな旅だったけどさ。
いろいろ知って、考えることができて、よかったと思うんだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ORNKHAI_000_221<tab>Although this was but a small gesture, I am sure that our thoughts have reached him.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ORNKHAI_000_221また、こうやって、
いっしょに旅しようね……？

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ORNKHAI_000_222<tab>I have much to ponder on the return journey, and I expect that Alberic will wish to hear what we have learned from Faunehm. Perhaps you could visit him in Coerthas?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ORNKHAI_000_222さあ、行こっか……。
僕は父ちゃんに、この旅のことを伝えるよ。
「アルベリク」のおっちゃんにも、聞かせてあげといてね。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ALBERIC_000_230<tab>Were you able to pay your respects?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ALBERIC_000_230戻ったか、)) (( )) 02 /var>……。
それで、ニーズヘッグの弔いは終わったのか？

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ALBERIC_000_231<tab>I see... This is the first time I have heard such a detailed account of King Thordan's acts. A betrayal in the moment, but a betrayal nonetheless. A pity he is far beyond the reach of justice.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ALBERIC_000_231なんと……トールダン王の裏切りの発端には、
そのような出来事があったとは……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ALBERIC_000_232<tab>Though it may be hard to come to terms with the crimes of our forebears, we must accept the past for what it is.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ALBERIC_000_232神殿騎士団を通じて報告し、
正しき歴史のひとつとして伝えてゆかねばなるまい。
それが、竜と共に生きることを決めた、我らの未来も照らそう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ALBERIC_000_233<tab>Of course, I shall be sharing this information with the rest of the Temple Knights. No doubt they will be keen to speak with other members of Nidhogg's brood to verify this version of events.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ALBERIC_000_233千年の悲しみをなかったことにはできないが、
明日を共に生きていくことはできる。
その道筋を護ることも、新時代の竜騎士の役割なのかもしれんな。

source: TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ALBERIC_000_234<tab>In the meantime, there is still much to be done in building relations between man and dragon. We will aim to follow the example set by you and Orn Khai, and work together for the good of all. May the Fury guide you both.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC004_03213_ALBERIC_000_234ありがとう、)) (( )) 02 /var>。
おかげで私もまた、元「蒼の竜騎士」のひとりとして、
前に進むことができそうだ。
